name: The Spa at Silver Legacy
description: The Spa at Silver Legacy is a 21,000-square-foot wellness facility occupying the entire fourth floor of the resort. The spa features 12 treatment rooms (including 3 couples suites), seven hydrotherapy soaking tubs, a Himalayan salt inhalation room, three relaxation lounges, two steam rooms, two saunas, two private hospitality suites for groups, and a full-service salon. Signature treatments include the Tahoe Trilogy salt scrub experience and the Fiery Snow Facial using hot and cold elements. Products feature custom-blended scents inspired by Sierra botanicals developed with UNR.
shortDescription: 21,000 sqft spa on Silver Legacy's 4th floor with 12 treatment rooms, salt room, and hydrotherapy.

faqs.question: What services does The Spa at Silver Legacy offer?
faqs.answer: Full massage therapies, body treatments, facials, salon services, steam room, and sauna.

faqs.question: Do I need to be a hotel guest?
faqs.answer: The spa welcomes both hotel guests and non-guests. Advance booking is recommended.

faqs.question: Is this good for post-golf recovery?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Deep tissue and sports massages are popular with golfers for recovery after a round.

testimonials.quote: The Spa at Silver Legacy was exactly what we needed after 3 days of golf. GTHS built it into our package and it was a smart add. Everyone left feeling refreshed and ready for the next round.

testimonials.quote: Booked spa treatments at The Spa at Silver Legacy as part of our non-golfer package. Incredible facilities and the staff was very professional. Perfect option for the non-golfers in our group.
